attributes.action: Remove the rule denying citizenship to those who entered the UK illegally
attributes.additional_details: This rule unfairly punishes people who have built lives in the UK and meet all other citizenship requirements. Many have contributed to society and deserve a fair chance to become British citizens. The government should remove this restriction and ensure a just immigration system
attributes.background: The new Home Office rule unfairly denies British citizenship to people who entered the UK illegally, even if they have lived here for years and meet all other requirements. We urge the government to remove this restriction and allow fair access to citizenship based on existing eligibility criteria

rejection.details:
